projects.mongolnetDescription: I developed a National Social Network Platform called Mongol.net using React with Vite, Tailwind CSS, NestJS, Flutter, and GraphQL. If you have any specific inquiries or would like more information about this project

home.title: Hattanzorg
home.subtitle: Kernel Enjoyer Geek (Developer / Designer / Anime Fan)
home.bio: Hattanzorg is a full-stack developer based in Ulaanbaatar who has a passion for solving problems through product planning, design, and coding. With 5 years of experience in mobile and web development, he has provided professional expertise across diverse projects using skills cultivated since his third year of university. He has a strong interest in reverse engineering and exploit development, and has also challenged himself with building his own operating system. Offline, he enjoys anime, manga, and light novels, and occasionally cosplays as a hobby. Currently, he works on Odoo ERP business projects while also engaging in personal projects such as developing a simple kernel OS.

timeline.2019: Completed internship at Able Soft and worked as a developer.
timeline.2021: Completed bachelor's degree at MUST and started working at Sod Mongol LLC.
timeline.2023-01: Finished work at Sod Mongol LLC.
timeline.2023-02: Currently working at Next Social Platform LLC.

about.hello: Hello, I'm a full-stack developer based in Ulaanbaatar!
about.description: Hattanzorg is a full-stack developer with a passion for problem-solving through product planning, design, and coding. He has experience in both web and mobile development, enjoys learning new technologies, and when not coding, loves playing with his dog.

items.text: Studied Computer Science at the National University of Mongolia.
Worked as a Frontend Developer at various startups.
Senior Developer at Next Social Platform LLC.
